content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 1 this pattern is worked from corner to corner and uses the cluster stitch for a beautiful and squishy texture it combines 3 different colors to create more interest > this pattern is part of my **5 > no-starting chain baby blankets > ebook** 4 skill level - easy the pattern is written using english u s terminology hooks size needed 4 5 mm the blanket is crocheted worsted #4 weight yarn - i used knit picks - comfy worsted 3 total amount of yarn needed - 650gr/1 417m/1 550yds if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final copyright © 2021 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up 3 http //shrsl com/347g2 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/5-no-starting-chain-crochet-baby-blankets-ebook
